title: The Stickit minister,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: He had a great desire in his heart to be a leader among men, and the chance which opened to him among the shepherds and small sheep farmers of the Scaur Water was peculiarly fascinating.

title: The Stickit minister,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: He had dwelt five years by the side of the Scaur Water.
